text: Biwer is a commune and small town in eastern Luxembourg.Commune de Biwer ; retrieved 2012-4-25. The commune is in the canton of Grevenmacher, Canton de Grevenmacher ; retrieved 2012-4-25. which is part of the old district of Grevenmacher.CityPopulation.de, "Luxembourg, Grevenmacher", citing Le Portail des Statistiques du Luxembourg, Communes in the boundaries of Greenmacher, January 2012; retrieved 2012-4-26. It is made up of Biwer, Boudler, Brouch, Hegelsdorf, Wecker and Weydig.Biwer, DÃ©couvrir la commune ; retrieved 2012-4-26. In Biwer, the largest village of the commune, are every public buildings. There are the primary school called 'An der Wiss', the cultural centre 'Fancy', a swimming pool, a sports hall and a day-care centre. ==References== ==Other websites== * Biwer commune website Category:Communes of Grevenmacher
title: Biwer
